Class.Name: ChainOfResponsibility
Class.Description: A collection of generic design patterns, mostly from the 'Gang of Four' book.

Function.Name: set_next
Function.Description: Adds a new command to the chain

Function.Name: execute
Function.Description: Overridable function that is the concrete execution of the command

Function.Name: generate
Function.Description: Generates a chain of respoinsibility pipeline from an array of commands by linking them.
